CustomField.description: Cluster of fields to be used in a report's grouping column to improve installation dispatching efficiency. See CR: https://trello.com/c/PU33egVT/334-enhancements-to-installation-sa-reporting-todd
CustomField.formula: TEXT(Type__c)&" | "& Account_Name__c &" | "& State &", "& City &", "& PostalCode &" | "& Street & " | " & HYPERLINK("/" & Id , AppointmentNumber)
CustomField.label: Fields For Reporting
